instruction: Ethinyl estradiol 0.02 mg oral tablet, one tablet every day at the same hour with no breaks, the last seven are placebo. Duration: six months. Targeted condition: contraception.

attributes.note_to_pharmacist: Dispense 7 packs of YAZ (28) 3 mg-0.02 mg tablets to cover a 180-day supply.
attributes.sig: Take one tablet by mouth daily at the same time each day, with no breaks between packs, to ensure consistent hormone levels.

instruction: Levonorgestrel 0.1 mg oral tablet, one tablet every day at the same hour with no breaks, the last seven are placebo. Duration: six months. Targeted condition: contraception.

attributes.note_to_pharmacist: Dispense 28 tablets per cycle, with 6 refills to cover a total of 180 days.
attributes.sig: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily at the same time each day. Continue taking the tablets without breaks, including the 7 placebo tablets at the end of each cycle.

instruction: Set a daily alarm on your phone for whatever time you can reliably manage to take the pill. If under twelve hours late, just take the pill; over twelve, take one immediately and another at the usual hour tomorrow, then use condoms for seven days.

attributes.comment: Set a daily alarm on your phone for whatever time you can reliably manage to take the pill.
